column4: Is it possible to install karmic anew and install GRUB1 instead of GRUB2?
I want to install karmic fresh but do not want GRUB2. How should I do this?
from what little i've read about it, you need to install grub2 then post install install grub-legacy
I can't just install grub-legacy with the installer? Or choose not to install GRUB2 at all?
